name: Weedicide
description:
Ever get sick of those stupid weeds taking over your garden?

Ever wanted to just go around and smash them?

Well you can!

In this game you unfortunately have to deal with weeds again, but with giant hands to smash them!

This game was made in the #WeeklyGameJam . It is unfinished and unfortunately I didn't have time to add what I wanted, but it's actually kind of fun if I do say so myself.

Space to smash, arrows to move, and Esc to exit.
